docs.snippet: A veteran federal judge in Chicago has withdrawn from NBA legend Michael Jordan's lawsuit against a local supermarket chain over the use of his name and image in a magazine ad, but not without levying harsh criticism at the basketball Hall of Fame...

docs.snippet: Tony Gwynn, who died of cancer, said proudly that he learned something new at the ballpark every day, a simple, powerful lesson in a sport with a punishing schedule....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tony Gwynn, who died of cancer, said proudly that he learned something new at the ballpark every day, a simple, powerful lesson in a sport with a punishing schedule.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; Tony Gwynn, who died of cancer at age 54, may have embodied baseball better than anyone else who has played it, because of the wonder he found in the game and joy he took in applying his daily discoveries; San Diego Padres 15-time All-Star and Hall of Famer had 3,141 career hits and .338 batting average.

headline.seo: Tony Gwynn’s 2 Hitting Secrets: Work and More Work
headline.main: In a .338 Lifetime Average, Every Day Counted
headline.print_headline: In a .338 Lifetime Average, Every Day Counted

docs.snippet: The justices also allowed a challenge to a law banning lies in political campaigns to move forward and refused to hear a case about holding school graduations in churches....
docs.lead_paragraph: The justices also allowed a challenge to a law banning lies in political campaigns to move forward and refused to hear a case about holding school graduations in churches.
docs.abstract: Supreme Court allows challenge to Ohio law banning lies in political campaigns to move forward; votes 5-to-4 to allows prosecution under a federal law that requires gun buyers to disclose if a gun is being purchased for someone else; refuses to hear case about holding high school graduations in churches.

headline.main: Supreme Court Rules Against ‘Straw’ Purchases of Guns
headline.print_headline: Justices Permit Challenge to an Ohio Law Banning Lies During Campaigns
